title: "Medical Progress is about to leap forward thanks to EU startup Data Lake"
excerpt: "Access to data is more than just important to scientific research and discovery – it’s now the basis for progress in the modern era, particularly in medicine and healthcare. Despite this, there is no data access solution worldwide that gives terminally-ill patients hope for new therapies by using the already-collected medical data of other patients."
